com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.render

Interface IGameStateRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderCallback, ISurfaceManager.ISurfaceCallback
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEngineGamestateRenderer, ILocalMapStateRenderer, IModularGameStateRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameStateRenderer, AndroidLocalMapStateRenderer, EmptyGameStateRenderer, EngineGamestateRenderer, LocalMapStateRenderer, ModularGameStateRenderer, UserGamestateRenderer

    public interface IGameStateRenderer
extends ISurfaceManager.ISurfaceCallback, IRenderCallback
    Manages the rendering context for a state. Can be used as the main renderer.
